title: The Human face [Widescreen]
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, James Erskine and David Stewart
brief_description: Comedian John Cleese and actor/model Liz Hurley present this BBC television documentary series exploring the dimensions of the human face, including its creation, function, sexuality, communication, identity and perception. Also features appearances by Michael Palin, Pierce Brosnan, Joan Rivers, Candice Bergen and David Attenborough. The four parts to the series are ‘Face to Face’, ‘Here’s Looking at You!’, ‘Beauty’ and ‘Fame’.
